ygData.subject: Re: Welcome to EQ_women@onelist.com
ygData.msgSnippet: In a message dated 11/11/1999 9:09:59 AM Central Standard Time, judy3t@usa.net writes:
ygData.messageBody:
In a message dated 11/11/1999 9:09:59 AM Central Standard Time,
judy3t@... writes:

<< DON'T DO IT!!!

The game is totally addictive and will take over your life! Other than
that, it's great. >>

:o)
Thanks for the advice, but it's too late. I've already shelled out the $50
I'm just waiting until I have a break to actually spend a bit of time on it
before I try it out. After all it says the first month is free so I want to
be able to give it a good test drive.
Luckily I have some vacation time coming up soon.
:o)
Brangvyne
